description: Two ants, standing on a mushroom, gaze at a star-filled night sky and a crescent moon. They remark on feeling small and insignificant due to the cosmic scale. This creates irony by having already tiny creatures ponder their own lack of importance relative to the vast universe. The image juxtaposes the immense cosmos with the miniature world of the ants and their fungal perch.
caption: "Just look at those stars tonight. ... Makes you feel sort of small and insignificant."
